heroGroup.heading: **We can all help end opioid addiction.**
heroGroup.text: By working together, we can empower our families, neighbors and communities.

blocks.heading: Action, advocacy and involvement
blocks.largeText: The National Center for Wellness and Recovery is the global leader in pain and addiction research. There are many ways you can get involved and help.
blocks.smallText: Join us in our mission to inspire hope and to develop innovative, science-driven treatment interventions to improve the lives of those afflicted by pain and substance use disorders.

options.label: Settlement agreement
options.heading: Settlement agreement and Purdue Pharma investment.
options.body: In 2019, Oklahoma received an unprecedented $177.5M opioid settlement. Separately, Purdue Pharma gifted NCWR with two decades worth of biosamples and research molecules never before leveraged for research and cannot be reproduced today, to help fast-track R&D.

options.label: Startup endowment
options.heading: A focused investment of funds for greater impact.
options.body: Rather than scatter dollars around the state, Oklahoma’s opioid settlement created one focused resource: the National Center for Addiction Studies and Treatment Foundation, which funds the NCWR.

options.label: Federal funds
options.heading: Federal funds and grants.
options.body: Only by working together can we end opioid addiction. The National Center for Wellness and Recovery focuses federal funds, grants and collaborations for the greatest impact.

blocks.quote:
“I’m Travis. I’m an athlete.
 And I overcame opioids.”
blocks.text: If you need answers or treatment we can help you too.
